detail_desc: Block-coloured top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a print on one leg, elasticated drawstring waist and a back pocket.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with appliqués and side stripes. Double-layered hood with a decorative drawstring, zip down the front and striped ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, appliqué on one leg, side pockets and a back pocket. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.

Polo shirt in piqué made from a cotton blend with an appliqué and print motif on the chest. Ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves in a contrasting colour with striped ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Polo shirt in piqué made from a cotton blend with an appliqué and print motif on the chest. Ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves in a contrasting colour with striped ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and flared legs.
Short, sleeveless top in viscose jersey with a deep, rib-trimmed neckline, ribbing around the armholes and an overlocked hem with ties at the front.
Short, sleeveless top in viscose jersey with a deep, rib-trimmed neckline, ribbing around the armholes and an overlocked hem with ties at the front.
Short, sleeveless top in viscose jersey with a deep, rib-trimmed neckline, ribbing around the armholes and an overlocked hem with ties at the front.
Short, sleeveless top in viscose jersey with a deep, rib-trimmed neckline, ribbing around the armholes and an overlocked hem with ties at the front.
Small shoulder bag in canvas with suede details, a narrow metal chain shoulder strap and a flap with a magnetic fastener. Card compartment inside with space for three cards. Lined. Size 7.5x17x21 cm.

Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a decorative seam front and back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a decorative seam front and back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a decorative seam front and back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a decorative seam front and back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in soft slub cotton jersey with lace detailing at the top, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short flounced sleeves in woven fabric. Gathered seam at the waist, side pockets and straight legs.
Ballet pumps with a bow at the front, elastic strap over the foot and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Ballet pumps with a bow at the front, elastic strap over the foot and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Suit trousers in a patterned weave with a regular waist, concealed fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with turn-ups at the hems.
Heart-shaped plastic pot with an eyelet and satin ribbon at the top. Contains plastic hair clips and hair elastics. Size approx. 2.5x10.5x11.5 cm. Not for children under 3.
Short skirt in patterned jersey crêpe with an elasticated drawstring waist and a frill-trimmed seam above the hem. Unlined.
Short skirt in a patterned weave with a sewn-in wrapover with a draped effect at the front and decorative tie at one side. Concealed zip at the back and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a text print at the back and ties at the sides.
Fully lined, patterned bikini bottoms.
Fully lined, high-waisted, patterned bikini bottoms with an elastic waistband.

Calf-length dress in a patterned cotton weave with a smocked bodice, seam at the waist and flared skirt with flounces. Lined with a short skirt.
Sleeveless dress in a plumeti cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Concealed zip in one side, a seam under the bust with pleats and a wide skirt. Lined.
Skirt in tulle with glitter. Elastic waistband with a bow, seam with a small frill trim and a flounced tier to the hem. Lined.
Skirt in tulle with glitter. Elastic waistband with a bow, seam with a small frill trim and a flounced tier to the hem. Lined.

V-neck body in lace and mesh with lined cups, narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and press-studs at the crotch.

Mesh trainers with imitation leather and imitation suede details, a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Recycled mesh linings and insoles and chunky EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.

Coat in a felted wool blend with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Welt front pockets with a flap, a fake welt chest pocket, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
